channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russian Boat Marines Blast Their Way Through FPV Barrage With Shotguns
item.description: A new Russian video gives a dramatic demonstration of how shotguns can provide protection against FPV drones. But it does not tell the whole story.

item.title: These Are The Thanksgiving-Week Travel Times And Roads To Avoid, Data Shows
item.description: Plan ahead to make getting “over the river and through the woods” a stress-free journey.

item.title: Has Samsung Installed ‘Unremovable Israeli Spyware’ On Your Phone?
item.description: Samsung responds to accusations it has embedded AppCloud "spyware" on hundreds of millions of Galaxy phones.

item.title: Copy And Paste Cybersecurity Warning — 99% Of Enterprises Now At Risk
